channel.title: CVE Feed for kau-boy -- Hello World
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kau-boy -- Hello World

item.title: CVE-2024-9224|2024-10-01T13:53:33.447Z -- kau-boy -- hello%20world
item.description: The Hello World plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Reading in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.1 via the hello_world_lyric() function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to read the contents of arbitrary files on the server, which can contain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-9224|2024-10-01T08:30:13.891Z -- kau-boy -- hello%20world
item.description: The Hello World plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Reading in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.1 via the hello_world_lyric() function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to read the contents of arbitrary files on the server, which can contain sensitive information.
